jdbcService.sql: insert into order_entries ( id, created, modified, product_id, price, name, description, weight, certificate, length, quantity, length_unit_id, weight_unit_id, vat, order_id ) values ( :id, :created, :modified, :productId, :price, :name, :description, :weight, :certificate, :length, :quantity, :lengthUnitId, :weightUnitId, :vat, :orderId )
